name: astrally
content:
astrally adverb
(STARS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal in a way that relates to the stars or outer space: The map corresponds astrally to an area of the sky near the Andromeda galaxy. These monumental structures were astrally aligned.
More examplesFewer examplesAstrologers believe that human lives and characters are astrally determined.They used an astrally based map to help them navigate at night.

astrally adverb
(MAGIC)
in a way that relates to or uses mysterious forces that are believed by some people to exist in a non-physical universe: She used magic to astrally travel into the future. He astrally took control of her and made her steal the necklace.
More examplesFewer examplesHe claimed to have travelled astrally across continents.She said that she had astrally projected herself into his house.
